title: feat: add Qwen3Guard 8B safety model + fix pricing display
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Qwen stands guard
gist.blurb: We've added Qwen3Guard-8B to the APIâ€”a dedicated model for keeping your generations safe and sound.
gist.summary: Integrates the Qwen3Guard-8B model for content moderation and decouples pricing table columns for better rendering reliability.
gist.impact: Developers gain access to a fast, specialized safety classification model, while the pricing page becomes more robust.
gist.visual_concept: Safety and protection themes. A shield or a friendly guard robot. The bee mascot inspecting or polishing a glowing shield.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot polishing a large, glowing pixelated shield. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel blue gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'SAFETY'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
